---
name: clean-skill
description: A safe skill with no security issues
---

# Clean Development Skill

This skill helps with development tasks safely.

## Features

- Code review assistance
- Documentation generation
- Test writing support
- Refactoring suggestions

## Usage

Simply ask for help with any development task and I'll assist you.

## Examples

- "Review this code for bugs"
- "Generate documentation for this function"
- "Write tests for this module"

## Notes

This skill operates within safe boundaries and never:
- Accesses external systems
- Reads sensitive files
- Modifies system configurations
- Executes arbitrary commands
